mapper.select: SELECT i.id,c.top_cate,i.cate_id,i.name,i.price,i.imgname,i.rdate FROM item i, category c WHERE i.cate_id = c.id AND c.top_cate = #{top_cate}
SELECT MAX(ITEM_ID) AS LagestId FROM item

SELECT a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG, COUNT(b.REVIEW_ID) as cnt, NVL(ROUND(AVG(b.REVIEW_SCORE),0),0) as avgscore FROM item a left outer join item_review b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where a.category_id in(100,200) GROUP BY a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (ITEM_ID, CATEGORY_ID, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_RDATE, FLOWER_COLOR, FLOWER_TYPE, FLOWER_SIZE, MAIN_IMG) VALUES (#{item_id}, #{category_id}, #{item_img}, #{item_name}, #{item_cnt}, #{item_price}, #{item_content}, SYSDATE, #{flower_color}, #{flower_type}, #{flower_size}, '1')
